verses.verse: And the king <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%> laid <S%H7760><s%> a tribute <S%H4522><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, and upon the isles <S%H339><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

And all the acts <S%H4639><s%> of his power <S%H8633><s%> and of his might <S%H1369><s%>, and the declaration <S%H6575><s%> of the greatness <S%H1420><s%> of Mordecai <S%H4782><s%>, whereunto the king <S%H4428><s%> advanced <S%H1431><s%> him, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Media <S%H4074><s%> and Persia <S%H6539><s%>? advanced: Heb. made him great

For Mordecai <S%H4782><s%> the Jew <S%H3064><s%> was next <S%H4932><s%> unto king <S%H4428><s%> Ahasuerus <S%H325><s%>, and great <S%H1419><s%> among the Jews <S%H3064><s%>, and accepted <S%H7521><s%> of the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of his brethren <S%H251><s%>, seeking <S%H1875><s%> the wealth <S%H2896><s%> of his people <S%H5971><s%>, and speaking <S%H1696><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> to all his seed <S%H2233><s%>.
